data.enText: to tell sb that sth is definitely true or is definitely going to happen, especially when they have doubts about it

data.chText: 你认为这是我故意干的，不过我向你保证不是的。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语 (+ that从句)

data.enText: You think I did it deliberately, but I assure you (that) I did not.

data.chText: 我们确信是在尽一切努力。
data.enText: We were assured that everything possible was being done.

data.chText: 我可以向你保证，她绝对安全。
data.enText: She's perfectly safe, I can assure you .

data.chText: 我们向他保证给予支持。
data.enText: We assured him of our support.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+直接引语

data.enText: ‘He'll come back,’ Susan assured her.
to make yourself certain about sth
He assured himself of her safety.

data.chText: 她查清楚信仍然在抽屉里。
data.enText: She assured herself that the letter was still in the drawer.
to make sth certain to happen

data.chText: 胜利将确保能参加决赛。
data.enText: Victory would assure a place in the finals.

data.chText: 胜利将确保他们能参加决赛。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: Victory would assure them a place in the finals.
to insure sth, especially against sb's death
What is the sum assured?
rest assured (that…)

data.chText: （强调所言确凿无误）尽管放心
data.enText: used to emphasize that what you say is true or will definitely happen

data.chText: 你就放心吧，我们会千方百计找到他。
data.enText: You may rest assured that we will do all we can to find him.

simple_means.memory_skill: as 表加强 + sure 确定 → 一再确定 → 肯定

ex.chText: 我可以保证他会还清债务的。
ex.enText: I can guarantee that he will pay off the debt.

ex.chText: 我不能保证天黑前完成那项工作。
ex.enText: I can't guarantee I will finish the work before dark.
The law guarantees equal rights for men and women.

synonyms.bx: 指以口头或书面形式作保证、担保、承诺，含若违背则予以补偿之意。

ex.chText: 我可以向你保证，你女儿在这里会很快乐的。
ex.enText: I can assure you that your daughter will be happy here.

ex.chText: 我们使游客确信准能过一个愉快的假期。
ex.enText: We assured the tourists of an enjoyable holiday.

synonyms.bx: 指用言语承诺某事一定会发生或一定是真实的，以消除他人的疑虑或担心。

ex.chText: 我用名誉担保她是清白无辜的。
ex.enText: I certify on my honour that she is innocent.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，指向他人保证某人或某事物可靠、没有问题等。

ex.enText: He promised to return the money to me.
He promised her that he would marry her.

synonyms.bx: 指保证一定会做某事或提供某物，或某事一定会发生，侧重于自己的主观意向，用言语使人感到放心。

ex.enText: He swore that he would get his revenge.

ex.chText: 我绝没有碰过他的钱包，我发誓！
ex.enText: I never touched his wallet, I swear!
He swore never to gamble again.

synonyms.bx: 指以发誓的形式作出保证，或强调自己所说的是真话。

data.enText: rest assured (that…)

data.chText: （强调所言确凿无误）尽管放心
data.enText: used to emphasize that what you say is true or will definitely happen

data.chText: 你就放心吧，我们会千方百计找到他。
data.enText: You may rest assured that we will do all we can to find him.

tr: be careful or certain to do something
example: He verified that the valves were closed
See that the curtains are closed
control the quality of the product

tr: assure somebody of the truth of something with the intention of giving the listener confidence
example: I assured him that traveling to Cambodia was safe
This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us

tr: inform positively and with certainty and confidence
example: I tell you that man is a crook!
The airline tried to reassure the customers that the planes were safe

value.def: If you assure someone that something is true or will happen, you tell them that it is definitely true or will definitely happen, often in order to make them less worried.

example.ex: He hastened to assure me that there was nothing traumatic to report...
example.tran: 他忙不迭地向我保证，并没有什么悲惨的事要诉说。

example.ex: 'Are you sure the raft is safe?' she asked anxiously. 'Couldn't be safer,' Max assured her confidently...
example.tran: “你确定木筏安全吗？”她不安地问道。“再安全不过了，”马克斯信心十足地向她保证道。

example.ex: Government officials recently assured Hindus of protection.
example.tran: 政府官员近来保证对印度教徒进行保护。

value.def: To assure someone of something means to make certain that they will get it.

example.ex: Last night's resounding victory over Birmingham City has virtually assured them of promotion...
example.tran: 昨晚大胜伯明翰城队实际上已确保他们能够晋级。

example.ex: Ways must be found to assure our children a decent start in life.
example.tran: 必须想办法保证我们的孩子有一个不错的人生开端。

value.def: You use phrases such as I can assure you or let me assure you to emphasize the truth of what you are saying.

example.ex: I can assure you that the animals are well cared for...
example.tran: 我可以向你保证动物们得到了精心照顾。

example.ex: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!...
example.tran: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

example.ex: And let me assure you I will use whatever force is necessary to restore order.
example.tran: 我向你保证，我将动用一切必要力量来恢复秩序。

value.tran: 我可以向你保证；相信我

partsOfSpeech.dec: as 加强 + sure 肯定 → 一再肯定 → 确信
as 表加强 + sur 肯定；安全 + ance 表状态 → 保证
as 表加强 + sur 肯定；安全 + ed 表形容词 + ly …地 → 无疑地
in 使… + sur 肯定；安全 + e → 使安全 → 保险
in 使… + sur 肯定；安全 + ance，insure 的名词 → 保险
re 一再 + assure 保证；确信 → 使确信
sur 肯定；安全 + ety 表状态 → 保证；保证人

rootsaffixes.indicate: 等加在同辅音字母的词根前, 表加强
rootsaffixes.title: ab-, ac-, af-, ag-, ap-, ar-, as-, at-

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 表加强 + brev 短 + iate 使… → 使一再变短 → 缩写
ac 表加强 + celer 速度 + ate 使… → 加快速度 → 加速
ac 表加强 + cent 唱歌 + uate 使… → 不停地唱 → 强调
ac 表加强 + company 伙伴 → 陪伴
ac 表加强 + cumul 堆积 + ate 做，造成，使… → 不断堆积 → 积累
af 表加强 + fili 子女 + ation 表结果 → 成为子女 → 入会
ag 表加强 + glomer 球状物 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成球状 → 成团
ag 表加强 + grand 大 + ize 使… → 一再大 → 扩大
ag 表加强 + grav 重 + ate 做，造成，使… →〔病〕加重 → 恶化
ag 表加强 + gress 行走 + ion 动作或状态 → 往前走 → 进攻
ap 表加强 + peas 平和 + e → 使〔人〕心态平和 → 抚慰
ap 表加强 + plaus 鼓掌 + e → 鼓掌
ap 表加强 + point 指 → 指定
ap 表加强 + preci 价值 + ate 做，造成，使… → 一再指出价值 → 欣赏
ar 表加强 + range 列 → 成列 → 安排
ar 表加强 + rest 休息 → 强制休息 → 逮捕
as 表加强 + sault 跳 → 跳起来〔争球〕→ 进攻
as 表加强 + sid 坐 + uous …的 → 一再坐着〔学习〕→ 勤奋的
as 表加强 + simil 一样 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为相同 → 同化
as 表加强 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 帮助
as 表加强 + soci 社会 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为一个社会 → 联合
as 表加强 + sure 确定 → 一再确定 → 肯定
at 表加强 + tach 钉 → 牢牢钉上 → 附上
at 表加强 + tain 拿住 → 获得
at 表加强 + test 试验 → 一再试验 → 证实
at 表加强 + tract 拉 → 不断拉〔眼球〕→ 吸引
